body: Minggang, The functionality is still there but those inputs to the annual schedule component were removed because they weren't actually generating holidays that could be run through the energy simulation in the output "schedule".  Holidays should be assigned using the "Honeybee_Energy Simulation Par" and you can still get a visual of the schedule with holidays included by passing the component through the Honeybee_Convert EnergyPlus Schedule to Values" component like so: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/bJVjO*-b49su-MEAnYyjqGaU6PWUqHBoCQRqyrRVTRHfOnG3fwlS3gb32KOXhQG5X6-JOY0WogYhGDrSNqSY4*i6hsTGvwQV/GenerateSchedules.JPG) I have to make a new video at some point that shows best practices for making new schedules.  I'll hopefully get to this soon. -Chris
